name: Snowy Jazz
description:
Made for the O2A2 Game Jam - May 2020.

Only One of Any Asset

One sprite, one background, one audio track, one sound effect, 1000 words, one big pile of fun! (Right...)

You are the assistant to Hugh Jassoll, ignominious scientist extraordinaire. His latest experiment to create an alternate dimension goes expectedly awry.

All comments, criticisms, concerns, etc. are welcome!
